name: Corona Festival Organizer Sim
description:
Welcome to the Corona Festival Simulator. Instructions are in-game.

**Known bug: You are able to place buildings on top of the ponds, and on top of each other, and also on top of the building icons, this will be solved at a later date, but for now build the tents in sensible places and the bug won't be a problem ;) 

Credits:

Programming and game design:
Mike Bailey

Free assets from Unity Asset store:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/tent-pack-19370
